name: Ellie Hooper
text: Very Highly Recommend‼️ Great Food‼️ Most "AWESOME" Management & Staff‼️

name: Karma Justice
text: Ordered big box , added extra topping which was pricey , pizza was okay,  garlic parmesan wings were pretty good,  breadsticks didn't have much buttery topping , lady that took order was nice, overall it was fair

name: Kellie Sornsen
text: it would be nice to get a fully cooked pizza just once its gotten to the point where i dont care to get pizza hut pizza again

name: Angie Moose
text: Pizza was delicious. Had breadsticks too. Fast friendly service.

name: Jennifer Barnes
text: Very nice people, order was right and hot. Recommend

name: Karen Barnette
text: fast reasonable price friendly

name: anita pennell
text: Perfect pizza everytime.. Reggie runs a great store. Thank you all at Pizza Hut

name: Lisa Lively
text: Reggie at Pizza Hut is t best manager I have ever met

name: Jerri
text: Had great service, delicious pizza but the prices are too high. They need to come down and match some other better pizza restaurants prices.

name: Bill Miller
text: Slow service didn't want to honor coupon for 6.99,got there they 7.99 coupon ,was told on phone extra topping 1.35,got there was 1.75. Not a good experience for us,will probably never go back.

name: Matthew Jones
text: Great pizza however it wasn't piping hot

name: Brayn Lorenz
text: had a lot better and service wasn't up to par

name: James
text: Best pizza hut around, the owner "Reggie" always has a smile on his face and always enjoy the service I get from them. I'm so excited to see that they are going to be offering delivery soon! I can't remember one time that my order was not correct, or when my pizza was not perfect.

name: Jo Huntington
text: Wow! The people are friendly but the price of the food is a bit steep for my taste. Speaking of taste...the pizza didn't taste the greatest either. I have eaten at pizza at pizza hut before and don't remember it tasting like this. I don't …More

name: Justin Sherrill
text: Ordered a pizza at 9:45pm not realizing the close at 10pm called to ask if they would still be able to deliver or if I needed to call somewhere else and they said no they understood they didn’t mind doing the pizza definitely getting my business over dominos

name: Randy Lambert II
text: Hot fresh fast food

name: Rebecca Sucharda
text: Really like Pizza hut good selection to choose from very hot Reggie the manager does really great cooking the food

name: will f
text: Not a restaurant.. drove all the way over and its just a pick up delivery location with nowhere to sit. left and went somewhere else.

name: Julie W
text: Very rude would not deliver but the manager was the nicest person in fast food if he was there I would eat there!

text: Katie is the nicest and fastest worker ive ever seen. Professional management and i plan on going back every saturday

text: Its ok  but seems like  toppings are  not as good as  they use to be,we still prefer  Pizza  Hut.

text: The wings were on point,  but the pizza made my Momma and me sick,  won't happen again! 28.00 dollars waisted

text: Best pizza in Taylorsville! The personal pans are my favorite, cheap and delicious, they're $4 no matter how many toppings you get.

text: This was our first time going to this Pizza Hut, in Taylorsville. Our order was ready and they took our daughter's reading coupon that was a month expired. We will definitely order from them again!
